sections.text:
44-7314.Violation of cease and desist order; penalty.

Any health carrier who violates a cease and desist order of the director under section 44-7313 may after notice and hearing and upon order of the director be subject to:

(1) A monetary penalty of not more than thirty thousand dollars for each violation, not to exceed an aggregate penalty of one hundred fifty thousand dollars; and

(2) Suspension or revocation of the health carrier's certificate of authority.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 1162, ยง 79.
